name: Rescript
long_description:
Rescript helps regulatory law and government relations teams automate and organize the never-ending process of keeping up to date with every regulatory and political development. 

Our AI-enabled software scans the web for news, writes detailed analysis of hearings and regulations, and helps teams manage all of their workstreams from one platform.

For more information, visit www.rescript.ai or contact our team at team@rescript.ai.
one_liner: Regulatory and Policy Intelligence for Law and Government Relations
